# GET /v1/gameCenterLeaderboards/{id}/relationships/releases | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/gameCenterLeaderboards/{id}/relationships/releases ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterLeaderboards-_id_-relationships-releases)

-  GET /v1/gameCenterLeaderboards/{id}/relationships/releases 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/gameCenterLeaderboards/{id}/relationships/releases

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterLeaderboards-_id_-relationships-releases#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/gameCenterLeaderboards/{id}/relationships/releases
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterLeaderboards-_id_-relationships-releases#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterLeaderboards-_id_-relationships-releases#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterLeaderboards-_id_-relationships-releases#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[GameCenterLeaderboardReleasesLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterleaderboardreleaseslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterLeaderboards-_id_-relationships-releases#see-also)

### [Managing leaderboard releases](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterLeaderboards-_id_-relationships-releases#Managing-leaderboard-releases)

[`List releases for a leaderboard`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterleaderboards-_id_-releases)Read the state of releases for a leaderboard and related information.[`Read leaderboard release information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterleaderboardreleases-_id_)Read the state of a specific leaderboard release.[`Create a leaderboard release`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-gamecenterleaderboardreleases)Add a new leaderboard release.[`Delete a leaderboard release`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v1-gamecenterleaderboardreleases-_id_)Delete a new leaderboard release.
